description: This table contains data about patient tasks assigned by MyChart Care Companion.

columns.name: ACTIVITY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: TASK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The task type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Specific


User Specific


Patient Event


Episode Specific


MyChart Patient Created

columns.name: TASK_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The functional context of a task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


General


Checklist


Staff Activity


Homecare Patient Encounter

columns.name: DOCMNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The documentation type for this task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


MAR


Notes


COLLECTION


I/O


Flowsheet


Education


Care Plan


Order Review


Order Entry


Patient Summary


Procedure Result


Multistep


Multistep Collection


Acknowledge


Documentation Review


Screening Form


Discharge Transport Request


Discharge Placement


Approval


Required Documentation


Questionnaire


Appointment


Review Dialog Message


Manual Denominator Entry


Link


General

columns.name: TASK_SCHEDULE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The scheduling status of a patient-assigned task. When a task is created it may not be scheduled right away.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Not Scheduled


Will Be Scheduled

columns.name: IS_PAUSED_YN
columns.description:
Whether a task is assigned to the patient is paused. When a task is paused, it will not have future instances and will not displayed to the patient until resumed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The goal that the task is associated with.

columns.name: FREQ_ID
columns.description: If you would like this activity to be performed at a different frequency than the ordering frequency, enter it here.

columns.name: FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: Surgical case linked to this task.

columns.name: CARE_INTG_ID
columns.description: The patient's care plan associated with the task

columns.name: PROBLEM_ID
columns.description: The problem associated with the task.

columns.name: PREGNANCY_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Pregnancy Episode linked to this task.

columns.name: ESCALATE_YN
columns.description:
Whether or not the task should be escalated if not completed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_PAUSED_YN

columns.name: ESCL_ELAPSE_TIME_NUM
columns.description: The amount of time before the task will be escalated, if escalation is enabled.

columns.name: START_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant for a PRN task

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: The end date from the scheduler.

columns.name: DISCONTINUE_DTTM
columns.description: Instant a task was discontinued

columns.name: TASK_START_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The start time of the task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Source


Now


On a Specific Date


Pend For Later

columns.name: AUTO_COMPLETE_COND
columns.description: Task Auto Complete Condition copied from LTR

columns.name: NUM_OCCURRENCES
columns.description: The number of times this task will occur.

columns.name: PERSONALIZABLE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Defines the personalization status of the notification times for the task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ANCHOR_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
When an anchor event is linked to this task, this stores the type of the anchor event.  


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Surgery


Pregnancy


Procedural Appointment


Hospital Discharge

columns.name: ANCHOR_EVENT_NAME
columns.description: Name of the anchor event to display to the provider in Patient To Do List activity.

columns.name: RESUME_ON_DISCHARGE_YN
columns.description:
Whether a task paused on hospital admission or added during hospital admission will start after discharge.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_PAUSED_YN

columns.name: DAYS_AFTER_DISCHARGE_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the number of days after hospital discharge this reminder will start. Value must be larger than or equal to 0.

columns.name: ENSURE_DELIVERY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines whether task will be delivered if scheduled start date has passed. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Always


Ignore Past Instances


Never

columns.name: APPT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: Appointment serial number for the appointment linked to this task.

columns.name: ADMISSION_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Admission contact serial number for the admission linked to this task.

columns.name: PERSISTENT_QUESR_SERIE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates that the questionnaire series associated with this task is persistent and what type of persistent questionnaire series it is.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


General


Symptom Check-in

columns.name: LINK_TEXT
columns.description: This item stores the display text for the associated hyperlink of this task.

columns.name: LINK_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the type of content found at the associated link of this task. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Text


Webpage


Video File


Video Stream


Audio File


Audio Stream


PDF Document


Google Play Link


FDI Audio


FDI Video


FDI Read

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_MODALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The modality of the appointment the patient will schedule for this task. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Video Visit

columns.name: TELEHEALTH_REASON_FOR_VISIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The telehealth reason for visit that will be used when the patient schedules the video visit.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


General Video Visit


Cough


Sinus


Rash


Back Pain


Headache


Ear Infection


Muscular Skeletal Injury


Urinary Tract Infection


Asthma 


Birth Control Evaluation


Insect Bite


Nausea


Diarrhea


Lactation Consultation 


Nutrition Consultation


Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease


Sore Throat 


Gout


Pink Eye


General E-Visit


Vaginal Discharge / Irritation


Heartburn


Fatigue


Acne


Constipation


Sunburn


Head Lice


Emergency Contraception


Poison Ivy


Cold and Flu


Anxiety


Athlete's Foot


Allergies


COVID Concern


Fever


Tooth Pain


Quitting Smoking


Sleep Concerns


Ear Pain


Urgent Care Visit


Urgent Care Visit (Covered)

columns.name: DEF_DISCHRG_BEHAV_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item defines the default behavior for this task when the patient is discharged. By default, the task will remain paused.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Keep Task Paused


Resume Task

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: The questionnaire series answer associated with the task.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The medication order associated with the task.

columns.name: POINT_TEACHING_TTP_ID
columns.description: The education point associated with the task.

columns.name: TOPIC_TEACHING_TTP_ID
columns.description: The education topic associated with the task.

columns.name: TITLE_TEACHING_TTP_ID
columns.description: The education title associated with the task.

columns.name: TOTAL_INST_CNT
columns.description: The total number of patient-assigned task instances which are no longer actionable or have been acted upon.

columns.name: COMPLETED_INST_CNT
columns.description: The total number of completed patient-assigned task instances.
